articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Firing Drill of Anti-Aircraft Rockets of KPA Anti-Air Units
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Firing Drill of Anti-Aircraft Rockets of KPA Anti-Air Units
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, watched a firing drill of anti-aircraft rockets of KPA anti-aircraft units in the western sector of the front.
					 The drill was aimed at inspecting the technological readiness of the modernized anti-aircraft rockets and capability of the anti-aircraft units in the western sector of the front to fight an actual war and seeking ways of studying and developing varieties of new type anti-aircraft rockets to bring about a turn in the combat readiness in the anti-aircraft field.
					
					 Involved in the drill were four anti-aircraft units deployed in the western sector of the front.
					
					 After hearing a detailed report on the situation of the anti-aircraft units and firing order and method at the observation post of the firing range, he watched the firing drill.
					
					 He instructed the commanding officers of the Air and Anti-Air Force and officials in the field of the national defence science to effectively and meticulously organize the work for rounding off the combat readiness of the said rockets and steadily facilitate the projects for updating the rockets and ensuring their precision as required by the new century.
					
					 He underlined the need for the field of national defence science to more dynamically develop varieties of new type anti-aircraft rockets suited to the demand of a modern war so as to firmly defend the blue sky of the homeland from any air strike of enemies.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled to bring the national air defence to a new strategic level.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, O Kum Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Ri Pyong Chol and officials in the field of national defence science.

articles.title: Mirae Scientists Street Completed
articles.content:
Mirae Scientists Street Completed
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Mirae Scientists Street made its appearance as a fairy street in the era of the Workers' Party on the bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang. 
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the construction site of apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology in May, Juche 103 (2014). After initiating a grand plan to build a modern street of scientists he named the street to be built "Mirae Scientists Street". 
					
					 There took place a ceremony for the completion of the street on Tuesday. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok and Pak Yong Sik and officials concerned, officials of units of the army and society, service personnel, builders and helpers, who took part in the construction, educators and scientists. 
					
					 Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the Cabinet, made an address. 
					
					 He said Mirae Scientists Street is a proud structure in the glorious era of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The party's trust and expectation for the educators and scientists are very great at present when the building of a thriving socialist nation is making rapid progress on a new higher stage, he said. 
					
					 He called for bearing deep in mind the call of Kim Jong Un for devotedly serving the great people and bringing about uninterrupted great leap and innovations startling the era in the building of a socialist economic power and a highly civilized nation by dint of the single-minded unity around the party. 
					
					 Senior officials of the party, state and army let the inaugural tape stretch across the venue of the event and service personnel, builders, educators and scientists of the army and society cut it. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round different places of the street.

articles.title: Singaporean Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Singaporean Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Singapore Council of Women's Organizations led by President Malathi Das left here for home Tuesday.

articles.title: National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Forest and Environment Protection Held
articles.content:
National Sci-tech Presentation in Field of Forest and Environment Protection Held
Pyongyang November 3 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of forest and environment protection took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday. 
					 Present at the presentation were officials, researchers, technicians and teachers of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, the State Academy of Sciences, the State Hydro-meteorological Administration, Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang University of Architecture and forestry management stations in different cities and counties. 
					
					 The objective of the presentation was aimed to earnestly study and introduce scientific and technical ways to bring about a fresh turn in the work for creating and protecting forest and conserving environment. 
					
					 The participants heard valuable papers which scientifically and theoretically explained the issues of rounding off tree-planting and cultivating methods as required by the specific conditions of the country and breeding trees of good species necessary for turning the country into a thick woodland and greenery and orchard, and widely spreading trees and decisively boosting the rate of rooting of saplings. 
					
					 There were also papers introducing research successes helpful to the work for letting people receive all benefits in the best natural environment including preventing air and water pollution, modernizing sanitation facilities and protecting ecological environment.

articles.title: Program Exhibition in Field of Education Closes
articles.content:
Program Exhibition in Field of Education Closes
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The 16th national program exhibition in the field of education closed with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Monday.
					 Kim Il Sung University, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Architecture, Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies, Huichon University of Technology and Sinuiju University of Education No. 2 placed the first at the exhibition.
					
					 At least 200 programs including education support program, multi-functional classroom management program and simulation experiment and practice program were highly estimated.
					
					 Jon Kuk Man, vice-chairman of the Education Commission, made a closing address.

articles.title: Effective Ingredients Newly Discovered in Aronia Fruit
articles.content:
Effective Ingredients Newly Discovered in Aronia Fruit
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Microbiological Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has discovered more effective ingredients in Aronia melanocarpa fruit.
					 Its recent research results show that extract from Aronia fruit contains 3 210 mg of hesperidin and 80 mg of rutin per its 100 milliliters.
					
					 The institute developed the technology of fermenting remain of processed fruit by a microbiological method, thus raising the extraction rate of hesperidin and rutin, each 19 times and ten times.
					
					 The Aronia fruit extraction technique won a gold medal at the 13th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies last year.
					
					 According to researcher Kim Sung Je, the effect of Aronia fruit as cardiacs is ten times higher than fruit of Crataegus pinnatifida. Its extract helps remove effete matter, sediment and fat in blood and neutralize poisonous matter. It is efficacious for angina cordis and myocardial infraction in particular.
					
					 The Aronia melanocarpa is native to North America. Horticulturists of Germany and Poland presented trees of this species as gifts to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the mid-1980s and early 1990s.
					
					 The President cultivated the tree personally and took a step to spread it throughout the country.

articles.title: Idea of By Our Nation Itself Serves as Invariable Principle for Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Idea of By Our Nation Itself Serves as Invariable Principle for Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- It is the invariable principle for national reunification to solve the issue of national reunification independently by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation responsible for it.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article Tuesday.
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself is the most correct one for national reunification the validity and vitality of which have been clearly proved through history and practice, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The vitality of the above-said idea lies in that it dramatically turned the inter-Korean relations of distrust and confrontation into those of reconciliation and unity. Its attraction has been fully displayed through the stirring reality in the June 15 era of reunification characterized by the improvement of the north-south relations and eventful achievements in the movement for national reunification.
					
					 The recent reunion of separated families and relatives and football matches of workers from the north and the south are the fruition of the idea of By Our Nation Itself which provided a good occasion for displaying the validity of the idea at home and abroad.
					
					 If the idea is shunned and its validity negated, the inter-Korean relations will hardly escape turns and twist and catastrophe.
					
					 The north-south relations which dynamically advanced after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration were deteriorated due to the south Korean conservative forces keen on the vicious moves for confrontation against reunification in collusion outsiders quite contrary to the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration and the idea of By Our Nation Itself, the basic spirit of the declarations.
					
					 When the above-said idea is respected and fully preserved, it is possible to achieve peace and reunification and when confrontation is sought while negating the idea, it would only deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and bring a war. This is a lesson taught by history.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Intensifies Crackdown on Actions against "State-compiled History Textbooks"
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Intensifies Crackdown on Actions against "State-compiled History Textbooks"
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The authorities of the south Korean Ministry of Education are busy unreasonably suppressing the Teachers Union which staged an action against "state-compiled history textbooks".
					 On Oct. 20, the union declared an all-out action to check the authorities' moves to introduce "state-compiled history textbooks".
					
					 On Oct. 23, it held a meeting of teachers' action to check the "state-compiled history textbooks", denouncing the authorities for their distortion of history.
					
					 Much upset by the action, the ministry issued an official notice to city and provincial educational offices across south Korea to find out teachers who had been blamed for absence, leaving earlier than usual and private tour.
					
					 Through such action the ministry is working hard to ferret out and punish teachers and those who took part in the meeting and allowed it.
					
					 On Oct. 29, the ministry made public that it would file complaint against the chairman of the union 
					
					 The south Korean authorities' reckless crackdown to bring the history back to the past dictatorship is meeting with strong protest of people from all walks of life including the field of the education.

articles.title: Candlelight Meeting Held in S. Korea in Protest against "State-compiled History Textbooks"
articles.content:
Candlelight Meeting Held in S. Korea in Protest against "State-compiled History Textbooks"
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Members of the Association of Men of Culture and Arts Opposing Introduction of "State-compiled History Textbooks," the "Network for Checking Introduction of State-compiled History Textbooks," the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations and other civic and social organizations and opposition party in south Korea held a candlelight meeting in Seoul on Oct. 27.
					 They said that it is the ruling method of the dictatorial regime to govern the people through twisted history education.
					
					 The introduction of the "state-compiled history textbooks" was prompted by the wrong historical outlook of the chief executive and her wild ambition to revive "yusin" system, they charged.
					
					 They blamed the chief executive for putting under carpet the truth and proclaiming a martial law against people, being keen on embellishing pro-Japanese acts and "yusin".
					
					 They demanded the regime retract its plan without fail.

articles.title: Punishment of Pro-Japanese Regime Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Pro-Japanese Regime Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations in South Kyongsang Province, south Korea held a press conference at the building of the provincial office on Oct. 29. They included the Kyongnam Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, Kyongnam Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations and the Kyongnam Progressive Federation.
					 They said that at the south Korea-Japan defence ministerial talks Japan, in fact, objected to south Korea's approval of "Self-Defense Forces'" advance into the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 This is a humiliating behavior bereft of even elementary self-respect and insult to the majority of the people demanding apology and reparation for Japan's past crimes and withdrawal of its moves for the revival of militarism, they charged.
					
					 On Oct. 28 the Pusan Women's Society made public a statement to denounce the authorities for holding humiliating talks with Japan without demanding apology and reparation for its past crimes such as sexual slavery.

articles.title: Shutdown of U.S. Firing Range Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Shutdown of U.S. Firing Range Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Residents of Phochon held a candlelight rally near the Yongphyong Firing Range of U.S. forces in Phochon, Kyonggi Province, south Korea on Oct. 28 in demand of the halt to the military exercise for aggression and shutdown of their firing range, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The participants honored the memory of those who fell victim to the war exercises of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces over the past several decades.
					
					 Speakers at the rally urged the U.S. to halt the military drill at once and close the Yongphyong Firing Range.

articles.title: WPK's 70th Anniversary Observed by British Political Party
articles.content:
WPK's 70th Anniversary Observed by British Political Party
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The New Worker, the organ of the New Communist Party of Britain, on Oct. 23 carried special write-ups under the title "The struggle of people's Korea for the freedom and independence" on three whole pages illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung in his external activities on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The DPRK thoroughly embodies the principle of independence, peace and friendship under the leadership of the WPK, the paper said:
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il made tireless efforts for the development of the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle and performed immortal exploits.
					
					 They clarified that victory in socialism is the law governing the development of history, one of the greatest feats performed by them.
					
					 They also made great contributions to the development of the Non-Aligned Movement (NAM).
					
					 Kim Il Sung stressed the need to solve problems arising in the NAM through negotiations on the principle of cohesion and positively helped the people of developing countries in their drive for building a new society.
					
					 The WPK, celebrating the 70th founding anniversary, is vigorously advancing at the helm of the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle as the beacon of hope of the world revolution under the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Denounces Japanese Authorities' Hostile Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Denounces Japanese Authorities' Hostile Moves against DPRK
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article on its website on October 21 to denounce the Japanese authorities' hostile moves against the DPRK.
					 The article said:
					
					 The Japanese authorities take issue with the DPRK's peaceful satellite launch pursuant to the plan for the state scientific and technological development to build an economic power and improve the people's standard of living, describing it as a "threat".
					
					 The DPRK sets forth independence, peace and friendship as the idea of external policy and makes positive efforts to defend peace and security of the region.
					
					 Japan is lost to all sense of decency and moral obligation as it criticizes the exercise of the legal right of a sovereign state, creates instability and poses threat to the region.
					
					 Japan has denied its past crimes for aggression and hastened militarization, far from finding a serious lesson from its defeat.
					
					 Japan spreads the "story about threat from north Korea", a trick to divert elsewhere the world public opinion.
					
					 It tries to change the negative understanding of the world of its wild ambition for dominating Asia including aggression on Korea by describing the DPRK as a "dangerous state".
					
					 Japan should not make an artifice to escape from the international accusation of its wild ambition for reinvasion but apologize for its past crimes against humanity and come out to redeem its past.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia entrenamiento de lanzamiento de unidades antiaereas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia entrenamiento de lanzamiento de unidades antiaereas de EPC
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes antiaereos de las unidades antiaereas del frente occidental del EPC.
					El entrenamiento tiene el objeto de inspeccionar y calificar el estado tecnico de los modernizados cohetes antiaereos y la capacidad de combate real de las unidades antiaereas del frente occidental y buscar el medio para investigar y desarrollar los modernos cohetes antiaereos de diversas variedades  a fin de lograr un viraje en los preparativos combativos del sector antiaereo.
					
					En los ejercicios participaron las 4 unidades antiaereas desplazadas en el frente occidental.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia al campo de tiro, el Mariscal escucho universalmente el estado de las unidades antiaereas, el orden y el metodo de disparos y vio losl ejercicios de lanzamiento.
					
					Al presenciarlos, hizo hincapie a los miembros de mando de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas y los funcionarios de la rama de ciencia de defensa nacional en la necesidad de organizar con escrupulosidad el trabajo para perfeccionar los preparativos combativos del cohete antiaereo y seguir acelerando la modernizacion y la alta precision de cohetes de acuerdo con la demanda de nuevo siglo.
					
					Subrayo que el sector de la ciencia de defensa nacional hay que activar mas el desarrollo de nuevos cohetes antiaereos de diversas variedades adecuadas a la guerra moderna para defender perfectamente de cualquier ataque aereo enemigo el cielo azul de la patria.
					
					Este dia, el Mariscal presento las tareas programaticas para llevar al nuevo nivel estrategico la defensa antiaerea estatal.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, O Kum Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Ri Pyong Chol y los funcionarios de la rama de ciencia de defensa nacional.

articles.title: Inaugurada avenida de cientificos Mirae
articles.content:
Inaugurada avenida de cientificos Mirae
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Se ha levantado a la orilla del rio Taedong de esta capital la avenida de cientificos Mirae. 
					Al visitar en mayo del 103 (2014) de la Era Juche el campo de construccion de viviendas para los educadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un presento un gran proposito de construir otra avenida moderna de cientificos y la denomino como avenida de cientificos Mirae. 
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 3 la ceremonia de inauguracion de dicha avenida con la participacion de Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik y otros funcionarios de la rama interesada, los funcionarios del ejercito y la sociedad, militares del EPC, constructores, cooperantes, educadores y cientificos. 
					
					La palabra de inauguracion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros. 
					
					Pak dijo que la nueva avenida es una orgullosa creacion de la gloriosa era de Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Destaco que en la actualidad en que la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista marcha vertiginosamente en una nueva etapa elevada, son muy grandes la confianza y esperanza del partido en los educadores y cientificos. 
					
					Llamo a todos a registrar incesantes saltos e innovaciones en la construccion de tal potencia economica socialista y civilizada guardando en lo profundo del corazon el llamamiento del Mariscal de servir al pueblo con toda disposicion y poniendo de pleno manifiesto el poderio de la unidad monolitica en torno al partido. 
					
					Constructores militares y civiles, educadores y cientificos cortaron la cinta de inauguracion extendida por cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes dieron vueltas por varios lugares de la avenida.

articles.title: Presentacion cientifico-tecnica nacional de rama de selvicultura y proteccion ambiental
articles.content:
Presentacion cientifico-tecnica nacional de rama de selvicultura y proteccion ambiental
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la presentacion nacional cientifico-tecnica de la rama de selvicultura y proteccion ambiental.
					Participaron en ella los investigadores, tecnicos, profesores y funcionarios del Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica, la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang, los centros de gestion forestal de ciudades, distritos, etc.
					
					La presentacion se efectuo con el objetivo de investigar y aplicar activamente los remedios cientifico-tecnicos para producir nuevo cambio en la repoblacion y proteccion forestal del pais y la proteccion ambiental.
					
					En la ocasion se presentaron las disertaciones de valor que argumentan en lo cientifico y teorico los problemas para perfeccionar los metodos de la plantacion y administracion de arboles adecuados a la caracteristica de Corea, crear y difundir ampliamente los arboles de buena variedad necesarios a realizar la reforestacion, y la creacion de jardines y huertas fruticolas y elevar decisivamente la proporcion de radicacion.
					
					Tambien, se distinguieron las monografias que reflejan los exitos de investigacion que permiten al pueblo disfrutar de la felicidad bajo el mas excelente ambiente natural incluyendo la prevencion de la contaminacion de la atmosfera y agua, la modernizacion de las instalaciones de purificacion y la proteccion del habitat total del pais.
